0.title: Relating to material participation in a business; prescribing an effective date.
0.description: Expands availability of elective reduced personal income tax rate for certain pass-through income to taxpayers doing business as sole proprietors. Applies to tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2018. Takes effect on 91st day following adjournment sine die.

1.title: Adjourning sine die the 2018 special session of the Seventy-ninth Legislative Assembly.
1.description: Adjourns sine die 2018 special session of Seventy-ninth Legislative Assembly.
